title: The 3 Trump Tweets that Have the Internet Melting Down
text:
The 3 Trump Tweets that Have the Internet Melting Down
“Actually, throughout my life, my two greatest assets have been mental stability and being, like, really smart,” President Donald Trump wrote on Twitter on Saturday morning.
Trump accused Democratic opponents of his presidency and “the fake news mainstream media” of trying to use mental health questions to challenge him as they did with Ronald Reagan.
“I went from VERY successful businessman, to top T.V. Star, to President of the United States (on my first try),” Trump wrote. “I think that would qualify as not smart, but genius….and a very stable genius at that!”
Trump said his political enemies were trying to raise questions about his mental stability because the Russian collusion story was a “total hoax.”
He also reminded critics that Hillary Clinton lost miserably despite trying to raise questions about his character and mental health to voters.
Trump is currently at Camp David, where he is meeting with Republican leaders in Congress and members of his Cabinet to discuss his agenda.
….Actually, throughout my life, my two greatest assets have been mental stability and being, like, really smart. Crooked Hillary Clinton also played these cards very hard and, as everyone knows, went down in flames. I went from VERY successful businessman, to top T.V. Star…..
….to President of the United States (on my first try). I think that would qualify as not smart, but genius….and a very stable genius at that!
Now that Russian collusion, after one year of intense study, has proven to be a total hoax on the American public, the Democrats and their lapdogs, the Fake News Mainstream Media, are taking out the old Ronald Reagan playbook and screaming mental stability and intelligence…..
January 6, 2018 at 4:39 pm
Fake news media will be taking a big hit come Monday Trump has set these idiots up for a miserable day of uncloaking there desperate lies and deception on the public get the popcorn ready the liberal tears will be flowing

Liberals still don’t get it that Trump tweets just to piss them off. And it works every time!

Yes, and the Democrats are famous for their huge lies when they don’t like someone. They can’t stand it because President Trump is so successful. There have been several statesmen who have called President Trump a genius and I believe that he is. He is a very stable person because anyone who can stand up under what the Democrats have been throwing at him shows he is a very, very stable person. They just as well let up because he’s not going to cave to them and he’s only being emboldened by their hateful attacks. They stay in the gutter with their lies and false accusations. They are the ones who have proven themselves as mentally ill. Anyone who won’t recognize a President who has already turned our Country around with the highest stock market ever, tax cuts FOR ALL AMERICANS, booming economy again, huge job market increases are plain BRAIN DEAD AND HATEFUL AND ARE SO JEALOUS OF HIS SUCCESS IT IS DRIVING THEM CRAZY!!!!

I think what really irks the democrats is the fact that President Trump is BEHOLDING TO NO ONE! He doesn’t take nor does he need the lobbyists money. NO ONE has the POTUS in their back pocket – they should be happy because it is costing these lobbyists and anyone else who line the pockets of politicians a whole lot less money.

Democrats have no message other than Destroy Trump. Their calling all Trumps People Stupid Red Neck Lunatics… Their Attack on FB is Heavy Right Now.. I think FB is dropping Them in To Conservative Sites, They won’t Own Up To Being Democrats but Say They Are Republicans For Rand Paul…Don’t Buy It….

Now I Can’t Share This To FB because People Have Complained That This Is Abusive..FB Takes They’re Side, Naturally. This is The Next Big Attack…

Be Careful Mr. President. After Nebuchadnezzar extolled his genius God struck and humiliated and he didn’t regain his mental faculties until he looked to heaven and acknowledged the Lord God as being supreme.

Hang tough Mr. President, we the people are behind you!
